label: Audio alert
description: Play a track or a message as an audio notification

playTrackAndResume.label: playTrackAndResume
playTrackAndResume.description: Play the given track and resume playback of the previously playing track

level.description: The volume at which to play the track

uri.description: The URI of the track to be played

playTrackAndRestore.label: playTrackAndRestore
playTrackAndRestore.description: Play the given track and restore the volume to its previous level

level.description: The volume at which to play the track

uri.description: The URI of the track to be played

level.description: The volume at which to play the track

uri.description: The URI of the track to be played
